title: [Large-scale] Language Proficiency Enhancement Project Utilizing an OBE-Based e-Learning Assessment System

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Operated in a BYOD environment, conducting non-face-to-face classes using real-time collaboration tools and e-learning platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess language expression abilities using e-rubrics within e-learning systems
Learners can receive three-tiered (High/Medium/Low) diagnoses of language learning strategies through PBL activity log analysis
Learners can establish and execute personalized language learning plans by utilizing the system's recommendation features.

resources: Real-Time Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Microsoft Teams, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
